entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS AND LARGE HAIL IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS AND LARGE HAIL IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE DAMAGING WINDS AND LARGE HAIL AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
